name: The Psychopomp (Laurence279)
description:
The Psychopomp Guide souls into the afterlife!

You are The Psychopomp - a powerful entity responsible for guiding souls into the afterlife. But beware! Accursed demons lurk beyond the darkness and will consume all that they see!

Instructions Build towers to help you achieve your goal:

Beacon Tower: Attracts nearby souls - Use this to forge a path towards the tower and redeem souls to build more towers!

Bombard Tower: Fires deadly cannonballs towards demons. Use this to protect your routes and build up a defence!

The enemy numbers will grow stronger over time, so be prepared! If your tower falls - you lose the game!

Are you ready?

GitHub
